text: Hervey Milton Cleckley was an American psychiatrist who wrote a book called The Mask of Sanity about Psychopathy. Cleckley also wrote a book about a female patient with Multiple personality disorder which was made into a movie called The Three Faces of Eve. Category:1903 births Category:1984 deaths Category:20th-century American people Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:American physicians Category:American psychiatrists Category:Writers from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Hervey M. Cleckley
